synopsis.text: XMaiden, humanity's last hope, is about to embark on a mission to save Earth from the clutches of a mysterious alien race in the year 20XX C.E. The sudden arrival of the extraterrestrial beings, known as Firow or Croix, triggers a devastating onslaught that pushes mankind to the brink of despair. Armed with specially designed weapons, the XMaiden must engage in a grueling battle to turn the tide and secure the future of humanity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
